ing: 1 cup chopped green bell pepper, or to taste
1/2 large onion, chopped, or to taste
des: "This is a colorful Christmassy cheese ball that my mother used to make in the 1960's. My whole family loves it as well as the teachers at my school."
ins: Mix cream cheese and Cheddar cheese together in a bowl using your hands. Add green bell pepper, onion, pimento peppers, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, and salt; mix well. Shape mixture into a ball and place in a bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours.
